tool_description: Establishes authenticated connections to social media platforms using provided credentials and returns session tokens for API access.

platform.description: Social media platform name (facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube)

api_key.description: API key for the specified platform

api_secret.description: API secret for the specified platform

error_messages: Invalid platform: Platform must be one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Authentication failed: Invalid API key or secret provided
Account not found: The specified account_id does not exist or is not accessible
Rate limit exceeded: Too many authentication attempts, wait before retrying
usage: Provide platform name and valid API credentials to establish an authenticated session for social media operations.

expires_at.description: Token expiration timestamp in ISO 8601 format

permissions.description: List of granted permissions for this session
